casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Galen Lee SMITH 206A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 Mark Montgomery, Attorney at Law, for Smith, Galen Lee. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, Brandy Cook, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of July 2018 by Defendant to Amend Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018."
